name: Steve
title: progress!
post: really enjoying my progress so far, down to less than 5 drinks a week

name: Barney
title: struggling
post: How do you guys take your mind off drinking? It's only been a few days and I'm already feeling the temptation...

name: Mike
title: We got this guys.
post: We're all gonna make it guys!

name: Anon
title: Need some advice guys.
post: Feeling a little bored sometimes out of work and my only hobby of gardening. What do you guys do that helps take your mind off things and keeps you busy? Extra points for hobbies that are also  inexpensive.

name: John
title: 100 day milestone!!!
post: It's Saturday and I've just hit my 100 day milestone of being completely clean!! Owe it all to this incredible community <3

name: Praveen
title: Saturday Things!
post: Morning guys and we made it to Saturday! I just did a nice hike and got roughly 10,000 steps and all before 11am! Post below what you guys are doing for your Saturday/weekend!!

name: Raveen
title: 1 YEAR LETS GOO!!
post: Just wanted to share that it's been a full 1 YEAR SINCE IVE BEEN DRY LETS GO DRY GUYS!! Also it's Friday evening and I have no temptation at all to drink - and it's all thanks to you guys. Thank you <3

name: Anon
title: Advice on drinks
post: Just trying to reduce my drinks for the time being. Anyone recommend what alcoholic drinks they consume with the least amount of alcohol during their journey?

name: Anon
title: Hey guys!
post: First time here and just starting on my journey - just wanted to say hi to y'all!
